backend/main.mo: Motoko actor with access‑controlled user profile storage allowing users to save and retrieve their own profiles, with admin‑allowed cross‑profile reads.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes plus base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML defining root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that gates all features behind branch authentication and renders calculator, daily totals, or print views.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGatePag: Gate screen requiring branch login and optionally offering Internet Identity connection.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchLogin: Branch login form that trims inputs, validates hardcoded credentials, and shows errors on failed login.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchSessi: Displays current branch session info with a logout button when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component handling Internet Identity auth flow, error states, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Notice bar offering a copy‑URL button with success/error feedback for sharing links.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: UI for viewing daily totals, selecting days, and displaying revenue and item quantities.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: Hook that loads available days, selected day, and computes daily revenue and per‑item quantities from ledger data.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: LocalStorage utilities for storing ledger entries, computing daily summaries, and retrieving per‑day bill data.
frontend/src/features/calculator/billCod: Generates a timestamp-based bill code with a 4‑char random suffix.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines the CatalogItem interface and a predefined menu of items with prices and categories.
Provides currency and number formatting helpers using INR locale.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Functions to normalize labels, find matching line items, and count quantities for catalog items.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: Catalog UI for searching, grouping, adding, editing, and managing predefined bill items with optional images.
Type definitions for the PredefinedItemCatalog component’s props and callbacks.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: Printable bill layout showing line items, totals breakdown, and receipt header/footer.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: Manages saving, loading, and clearing bill records in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator UI managing line items, catalog adds, totals, and saving/printing bills.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Defines types for line items, calculator state, and calculation breakdown.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Utility functions for parsing, clamping, and computing totals, tax, discount, and breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Reads an image file into a data URL string with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/Optim: UI page for configuring default receipt style, payment scan image, and print address.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/optim: Loads and saves bill format defaults to localStorage with validation.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/recei: Defines available receipt style options and the default style.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useOp: React hook to load, save, and optionally sync bill format defaults with backend.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useSy: Syncs bill print location from the user profile to local storage defaults, updating only when values differ.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Loads a saved bill and manages automatic and manual printing flow with cleanup and completion handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranchAuth.tsx: Provides simple localStorage‑backed branch login with hardcoded credentials and basic auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: Offers a function to copy the current URL using the clipboard API with fallback and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, loading identities, handling login, and exposing identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches the current user's profile using the backend actor, syncing loading state with actor availability.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and print‑optimized CSS rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Utility that shows a browser confirm dialog before deleting an item.
frontend/src/utils/iiProviderShim.ts: Ensures a safe default Internet Identity provider URL by setting process.env.II_URL from Vite or fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to get, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing and persistence logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme extensions, color variables, border radii, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including login requirements, known issues, and pending feature requests for gated authentication.
